---
id: discard-experiment
title: "DiscardExperiment"
description: "Discards an experiment without selecting a winner, effectively canceling the experiment and removing its effects."

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/experiments/{id}/discard"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Discards an experiment without selecting a winner, effectively canceling the experiment and removing its effects.
